name: iteration
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the process of doing something again and again, usually to improve it, or one of the times you do it
trans_examp.trans_cn: 反复（通常为了作出改善而重复做某事）

example.eg: the repetition and iteration that goes on in designing something
example.egtrans: 在设计某物时的重复与反复修改

example.eg: The software is on its fifth iteration.
example.egtrans: 这个软件已经是第五版。

trans_examp.trans_en: an amount that you get when you use a mathematical rule several times
trans_examp.trans_cn: 迭代，叠代（数学里若干次使用一个数学法则得出的量）
